title: A Good ReadME Template
description: A template to make good README.md

variables.label: Project Description
variables.name: 3476253434c5434dacf61619b72efc20
variables.defaultValue:
One Paragraph of the project description

Initially appeared on
[gist](https://gist.github.com/PurpleBooth/109311bb0361f32d87a2). But the page cannot open anymore so that is why I have moved it here.

functions.name: Getting Started
functions.description: A section to describe how to get started with the project

variables.label: Getting Started Description
variables.name: 760b43efba584578a80d98a06def0a82
variables.defaultValue:
These instructions will give you a copy of the project up and running on
your local machine for development and testing purposes. See deployment
for notes on deploying the project on a live system.

functions.name: Prerequisites
functions.description: A section to describe the prerequisites for the project

variables.label: Prerequisites Description
variables.name: 310a5c97888f40b0ad630f3bc09be928
variables.defaultValue:
Requirements for the software and other tools to build, test and push 
- [Example 1](https://www.example.com)
- [Example 2](https://www.example.com)

functions.name: Installation
functions.description: A section to describe how to install the project

variables.label: Installation Description
variables.name: 7bbd60fe712f4887bfce918334f0f29d
variables.defaultValue:
A step by step series of examples that tell you how to get a development
environment running

Say what the step will be

    Give the example

And repeat

    until finished

End with an example of getting some data out of the system or using it
for a little demo

functions.name: Running The Tests
functions.description: A section to describe how to run the tests for the project

variables.label: Running The Tests Description
variables.name: 825c48bc55ee428aacbb734a4d78d8fb
variables.defaultValue:
Explain how to run the automated tests for this system

### Sample Tests

Explain what these tests test and why

    Give an example

### Style test

Checks if the best practices and the right coding style has been used.

    Give an example

functions.name: Versioning
functions.description: A section to describe the versioning of the project

variables.label: Versioning Description
variables.name: 0c7f0eba0fda459e8390ac805fd27567
variables.defaultValue:
We use [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/) for versioning. For the versions
available, see the [tags on this
repository](https://github.com/PurpleBooth/a-good-readme-template/tags).
